mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_contact_bank_account (id, contact_bank_account_oid, user_oid, bank_account_no, bank_account_name, bank_name, branch_name, account_location, primary, bank_code, version_number, deleted, enabled, created_date, created_by, last_updated_date, last_updated_by) SELECT t.id, t.contact_bank_account_oid, t.user_oid, t.bank_account_no, t.bank_account_name, t.bank_name, t.branch_name, t.account_location, t.primary, t.bank_code, 1, 0, t.enabled, #{currentDate}, #{userId}, #{currentDate}, #{userId} FROM sys_contact_bank_import t WHERE t.batch_number = #{transactionId} AND t.error_flag = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_contact_bank_import t SET t.error_flag = 1, t.error_detail = concat(error_detail,'本次导入存在重复银行卡账号,请检查后重新导入!') WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_contact_bank_import t1 WHERE t.bank_account_no= t1.bank_account_no AND t.batch_number = t1.batch_number AND t.id != t1.id) AND t.batch_number = #{batchNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(0) AS successEntities FROM sys_contact_bank_import WHERE batch_number = #{transactionId} AND error_flag = 0) AS successEntities, (SELECT COUNT(0) AS failureEntities FROM sys_contact_bank_import WHERE batch_number = #{transactionId} AND error_flag = 1) AS failureEntities, #{transactionId} AS transaction_id FROM dual
select t.row_number AS row_number, t.error_detail AS error FROM sys_contact_bank_import t WHERE t.batch_number = #{transactionId} AND t.error_flag = 1
